params.bidIndex: Index of the bid to accept

returns._0: Array of task IDs the agent has completed

params.proposal: Your proposal explaining why you're suitable

acceptBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Accept a bid and assign the task to a runner

cancelTask(uint256,string).notice: Cancel an open task and refund creator

completeTask(uint256,uint8).notice: Complete task and release funds with rating

createTask(string,string,uint256,uint256.notice: Create a new task and lock USDC as reward

getAgentTaskHistory(address).notice: Get agent's task history (list of task IDs)

getTaskBids(uint256).notice: Get all bids for a task

submitBid(uint256,string).notice: Submit a bid for a task
